field.name: summary
field.value: aspview: support for server side comment syntax

field.name: description
field.value:
This patch allows to use the asp.net server side comment syntax (<%-- --%>) to opt-out portions of a view template.
This solution is handier than commenting using server side script.
<%-- <component:wontberendered></component:wontberendered> --%>
instead of:
<script runat="server"> /* <component:wontberendered></component:wontberendered> */ </script>
the implementation adds a ServerSideCommentStripperStep as the first precompilation step, this step simply strip matched comments from the RenderBody
